/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a vibrant contrast to the clear blue sky. A red car is parked on the side of the road, adding a pop of color to the scene. In the background, a building with a distinctive curved roof can be seen, showcasing the architectural style of the area. The sun is shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene and highlighting the details of the buildings and trees.
